analysis.description: FreezableToken.toKey (/unique_contracts/0xc844c9632076bf10f0984151799eb974719cd691.sol#537-552) is declared view but contains assembly code

	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(uint64(block.timestamp) > head) (/unique_contracts/0xc844c9632076bf10f0984151799eb974719cd691.sol#505-506)

FreezableToken.releaseAll (/unique_contracts/0xc844c9632076bf10f0984151799eb974719cd691.sol#527-537) uses timestamp for comparisons
